form.small_heading: Sign up now to join our weekly newsletter!
form.paragraph: Join our weekly newsletter to explore how our Goals shape a fairer, greener and brighter future for everyone. Each issue breaks down complex topics like clean energy access, climate action, and protecting life on land into clear, practical insights you can use in your everyday life. You'll discover inpsiring projects, simple ways to take action, and updates that keep you informed, motivated and connected to a communtiy that cares about the planet.

goal_7.aims: Ensure Access To Affordable, Reliable, Sustainable And Modern Energy For All.
goal_7.about1: Renewable energy solutions are becoming cheaper, more reliable and more efficient every day.
goal_7.about2: Our current reliance on fossil fuels and non-renewable resources is unsustainable and harmful to the planet as it produces large amounts of greenhouse gasses and perpetuates the greenhouse effect, which is why we have to change the way we produce and consume energy.
goal_7.about3: Implementing these new energy solutions as fast as possible is essential to counter climate change, one of the biggest threats to our own survival.
goal_7.target2: 7.2: Increase global percentage of renewable energy
goal_7.target3: 7.3: Double the improvement in energy efficiency
goal_7.target4: 7.4: Promote access to research, technology and investments in clean energy
goal_7.target5: 7.5: Expand and upgrade energy services for developing countries
goal_7.thing1: Find a Goal 7 charity you want to support. Any donation, big or small, can make a difference!
goal_7.thing2: Turn off your air conditioning, especially for sleeping - open a window or use a fan.
goal_7.thing3: Switch off your appliances at the socket. Turn off the lights when you're not using them.
goal_7.thing4: Buy rechargeable electronics. Don't buy or use one-use batteries.
goal_7.thing5: Don't use multiple devices at the same time. Be mindful about this and only several devices when absolutely necessary.
goal_7.thing6: Use solar energy sources. Install solar panels in your home for your heating and electricity. Use solar technology - radio, charger, lights etc…

goal_13.aims: Take Urgent Action To Combat Climate Change And Its Impacts.
goal_13.about1: Climate change is a real and undeniable threat to our entire civilization.
goal_13.about2: The effects are already visible and will be catastrophic unless we act now. Through education, innovation and adherence to our climate commitments, we can make the necessary changes to protect the planet.
goal_13.about3: These changes also provide huge opportunities to modernize our infrastructure which will create new jobs and promote greater prosperity across the globe.
goal_13.target1: 13.1: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate related disasters
goal_13.target2: 13.2: Integrate climate change measures into policies and planning
goal_13.target3: 13.3: Build knowledge and capacity to meet climate change
goal_13.target4: 13.4: Implement the un framework convention on climate change
goal_13.target5: 13.5: Promote mechanisms to raise capacity for planning and management
goal_13.thing1: Find a Goal 13 charity you want to support. Any donation, big or small, can make a difference!
goal_13.thing2: Recycle paper, glass, plastic, metal and old electronics.
goal_13.thing3: Compost. Composting food scraps can reduce climate impact while also recycling nutrients.
goal_13.thing4: Choose reusable products. Use an eco-bag for shopping and a reusable water bottle or a cup to reduce your plastic waste.
goal_13.thing5: Buy eco-friendly products. Read the packaging to see if products are produced in an eco-friendly way.
goal_13.thing6: Bike, walk or take public transport. Save the car trips for when you’ve got a big group.
goal_13.thing7: Consume less meat and become vegetarian for one day a week. The meat production industry has a huge impact on the environment.
goal_13.thing8: Reduce your use of paper. Avoid printing and substitute it with electronic devices or carriers. Don’t shop for pets! Visit your local animal shelter and adopt an animal there.

goal_15.aims: Protect, Restore And Promote Sustainable Use Of Terrestrial Ecosystems, Sustainably Manage Forests, Farmland And EcoSystems, Combat Desertification, Reduce And Reverse Land Degradation And Prevent The Loss Of Biodiversity In Nature.
goal_15.about1: A flourishing life on land is the foundation for our life on this planet.
goal_15.about2: We are all part of the planet’s ecosystem and we have caused severe damage to it through deforestation, loss of natural habitats and land degradation.
goal_15.about3: Promoting a sustainable use of our ecosystems and preserving biodiversity is not a cause. It is the key to our own survival.
goal_15.target1: 15.1: Conserve and restore terrestrial and freshwater ecosystems
goal_15.target2: 15.2: End deforestation and restore degraded forests
goal_15.target3: 15.3: End desertification and restore degraded land
goal_15.thing1: Find a Goal 15 charity you want to support. Any donation, big or small, can make a difference!
goal_15.thing2: Reduce your use of paper. Avoid printing and substitute it with electronic devices or carriers.
goal_15.thing3: Don't shop for pets! Visit your local animal shelter and adopt an animal there.
goal_15.thing4: Don't buy products tested on animals: Check the labels on the products you buy.
